forager.domain

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • forager.domain.Step

  • public class Step
extends java.lang.Object
    A state class that contains information about each step.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Step(Line line, Step previousStep, Cycle cycle)
      New step when the energy cost is taken from a pre-processed best path between two tiles.
      Step(Tile tile, Step previousStep)
      New step when visiting a normal tile while continuing an existing cycle.
      Step(Tile tile, Step previousStep, Cycle cycle)
      New step with a new cycle.
      Step(Tile tile, Step previousStep, Cycle cycle, int energyLeft, int timeSpent)
      New step with given values.
      Step(Tile tile, Step previousStep, int defaultValue)
      New step in which a default value is removed from energy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cycle getCycle()
      Returns the cycle of steps this step belongs to.
      int getEnergyLeft()
      Returns the amount of energy left in this step.
      Step getPreviousStep()
      Returns the step this tile was freached from.
      Tile getTile()
      Returns the tile reached in this step.
      int getTimeSpent()
      Returns the amount of time spent from the start of the search to this step.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Step

        public Step(Tile tile,
            Step previousStep)
        New step when visiting a normal tile while continuing an existing cycle.
        Parameters:
        tile - The new tile that was reached
        previousStep - Step from which the tile was reached.

      • Step

        public Step(Tile tile,
            Step previousStep,
            Cycle cycle)
        New step with a new cycle. Used when visiting a special tile for the first time.
        Parameters:
        tile - The new tile that was reached.
        previousStep - Step from which the tile was reached.
        cycle - New cycle started for this step.

      • Step

        public Step(Tile tile,
            Step previousStep,
            int defaultValue)
        New step in which a default value is removed from energy. Used when a special tile has already been visited previously, so it is treated as a normal tile with particular default weights.
        Parameters:
        tile - The new tile that was reached
        previousStep - Step from which the tile was reached.
        defaultValue - Default energy value.

      • Step

        public Step(Line line,
            Step previousStep,
            Cycle cycle)
        New step when the energy cost is taken from a pre-processed best path between two tiles.
        Parameters:
        line - Pre-processed best path between two tiles.
        previousStep - Step from which the tile was reached.
        cycle - New cycle started for this step.

      • Step

        public Step(Tile tile,
            Step previousStep,
            Cycle cycle,
            int energyLeft,
            int timeSpent)
        New step with given values. Used mainly for testing.
        Parameters:
        tile - The new tile that was reached
        previousStep - Step from which the tile was reached.
        cycle - New cycle started for this step.
        energyLeft - Amount of energy left at this step
        timeSpent - Amount of time spent up to this step
